content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-16.0, y=-49.0) with a fuel inventory of coal and iron-ore being supplied. The furnace is currently full with iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0) with a fuel inventory of coal and iron-ore being supplied. The furnace is operational but not producing any output currently.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-47.5) supplying iron ore to the furnace at (x=-14.0, y=-49.0).
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-46.5) storing items from the inserter.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) moving items from the chest to another location.
- Iron Chest at position (x=-11.5, y=-44.5) presumably storing iron plates.
- Multiple transport belts connecting the furnaces, chests, and inserters, facilitating the movement of items between these entities.

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of the following entities:
- A series of belts connecting various parts of the facility, ensuring the movement of materials between furnaces, chests, and inserters.
- Belt at position (x=-16.5, y=-47.5) outputting towards (x=-16.5, y=-46.5).
- Belt at position (x=-14.5, y=-46.5) outputting towards (x=-14.5, y=-47.5).
- Belt at position (x=-12.5, y=-46.5) outputting towards (x=-11.5, y=-46.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors such as "Could not insert: No iron-ore to insert from your inventory".

### Errors with inserters waiting for source items
- Check that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. If the inserter is waiting for source items, ensure the source is being supplied adequately.

### Errors with full output in furnaces
- Regularly check and clear the output of furnaces to prevent them from becoming full. This will ensure continuous production and prevent warnings such as "furnace result is full".
